uber

Class Uber

  • java.lang.Object
    • uber.Uber

  • public class Uber
extends java.lang.Object
    The Uber system. Contains the grid containing all of the users in the system, keeps track of the Drivers and Customers in the system, and controls the movements of these Users in the grid.
    Author:
    FaithChan

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Uber(int rows, int cols)
      Uber constructor.

      Gets the HashMap of Customers on Uber.

      Gets the HashMap of drivers held by Uber.
      int getGridCols()
      Gets the number of columns in the grid.

      Gets the number of rows in the grid.

      Checks if there are any drivers in the Uber system.

      Initializes the Uber grid using the Users described in the input file.

      Sets the location of the user to the parameter Location destination, and updates the state of the grid.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Uber

        public Uber(int rows,
            int cols)
        Uber constructor. Uses the input parameters to create a grid of the appropriate size; will default to a predetermined value if negative. Initializes the HashMaps of Customers and Drivers.
        Parameters:
        rows - The number of rows the grid will have.
        cols - The number of columns the grid will have.

    • Method Detail

      • getGridRows

        public int getGridRows()
        Gets the number of rows in the grid.
        Returns:
        The integer number of rows.

      • getGridCols

        public int getGridCols()
        Gets the number of columns in the grid.
        Returns:
        The integer number of columns.

      • withinGrid

        public boolean withinGrid(Location loc)
        Checks if the paramter Location loc is within the bounds of the Uber grid.
        Parameters:
        loc - The Location being checked
        Returns:
        true if the location is within bounds; false if not.

      • hasDrivers

        public boolean hasDrivers()
        Checks if there are any drivers in the Uber system.
        Returns:
        false if there are none; true otherwise.

      • getDrivers

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,Driver> getDrivers()
        Gets the HashMap of drivers held by Uber.
        Returns:
        A HashMap of Drivers, mapped to their IDs.

      • getCustomers

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,Customer> getCustomers()
        Gets the HashMap of Customers on Uber.
        Returns:
        A HashMap of Customers, mapped to their IDs.

      • initGrid

        public void initGrid(java.lang.String filename)
              throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Initializes the Uber grid using the Users described in the input file.
        Parameters:
        filename - The name of the input file.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • setLocation

        public void setLocation(User user,
                        Location destination)
        Sets the location of the user to the parameter Location destination, and updates the state of the grid.
        Parameters:
        user - The user whose position is to be changed.
        destination - The new location of the user.

      • printGrid

        public void printGrid()
        Helper function to print the grid.
